oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Embroidered postcard from Marvin Ragsdale to Edline Fly
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: World War I era postcard embroidered in silk with a partially unfurled American flag. Below in gold is "Long May It Wave." On the backside is a handwritten message from Marvin Ragsdale to his grandmother in Brentwood, Tennessee. He hopes she is "fine and dandy and enjoying life," and sends his love. Marvin Earl Ragsdale was a Ship's Cook, Second Class, aboard the USS Minnesota.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
